It looks like the "path" ref is null (IResouce#getLocation() can return null, see javadoc). Inverting equals in line 382 [1] should do the job.
[1] https://github.com/eclipse/mylyn.context/blob/master/org.eclipse.mylyn.context.ui/src/org/eclipse/mylyn/internal/context/ui/state/EditorStateParticipant.java#L382

The change was merged into master and the 3.8.x branch. Thanks very much!
I have pushed another review that adds test cases here: https://git.eclipse.org/r/#/c/9493/.

Verified with 3.8.3.v20130107-0100.
The error is now different but this is expected since the format between Eclipse 4.2 and 3.x is not compatible:
